column1: Excellent hotel. We stayed there for our wedding anniversary and we chose it for its position next to the Chinese park - we lived in China for six years and it brought our memories back. The hotel itself has an interesting touch of modern and traditional Chinese style. The hotel staff was friendly and they arranged a small cake for us waiting in our room. I requested a room with a view at the Chinese park and it was granted. The room was spacious, everything was clean and tidy. Breakfast had a large selection of food, including about ten Chinese dishes. Staff at the restaurant and especially at the reception was very helpful. They deserve praise. The only disadvantage of this hotel is the lack of a swimming pool and spa area as in other five-star hotels.
To far from the city centre, some of the stuff were good and some of them was not

The hotel is cheap and decent. But in the 5th floor internet is so weak doesn't work. Also the walls are not sound proof. You can hear what's happening in other room. Heater was too high. Had to keep opening window. But in budget I will say decent hotel.

Generally it was nice. I booked a comfort room with a small kitchen area up in the 5th floor, the building has no lift. However, I would say the bed was not that good, I had a slight back pain when I got home. But as I say. The best thing about it is the location, and friendly staff.
hotel in the city center with attractive prices. Overall clean and tidy. Overall, the impressions are positive, the staff is friendly and good-natured.
Good support staff, clean rooms, good Room facilities

I was in room number 802 , it was a very bad smell, I couldn't sleep from the bad smell. It is a smell of sewage inside the room. I wasn't happy at all. I can't believe that I am in a 5-stars hotel .
Nice hotel, good service, enough facilities, rooms are comfortable,
